title: SpaceX launches fourth Bandwagon rideshare mission
summary: SpaceX launched its fourth Bandwagon rideshare mission, carrying 18 satellites, including SAR satellites for South Korea, a technology demonstration satellite for Vast, weather satellites for Tomorrow.io, and three SAR satellites for Iceye as part of Space42's Foresight Constellation. The mission also included Starcloud's first AI data center satellite.

entities.name: ICEYE
entities.involvement: launched three SAR satellites as part of Space42's Foresight Constellation

entities.name: Vast
entities.involvement: launched Haven-Demo satellite for technology testing

entities.name: Starcloud
entities.involvement: launched first AI data center satellite

entities.name: Rendezvous Robotics
entities.involvement: partnering with Starcloud for self-assembling spacecraft technology
